verses.text: Mei he ngaahi loloto Kuo u tautapa Kiate koe, ‘e Sihova.
‘Ātonai ē, ongo‘i ‘eku lea: Ke tokanga‘i tu‘u ho fofonga ki he le‘o ‘o ‘eku hūfia.
Ka ne ke nofo, ‘e IĀ, ke lama kovi, Ko hai ha taha ‘e tu‘u, ‘Ātonai?
Ka ‘oku ‘iate koe ‘a e fakamolemole, Koe‘uhi ā ke fai ha ‘apasia kiate koe.
Kuo u nofo‘aki tali kia Sihova ē; Na‘e nofo‘aki tali hoku laumālie: Pea ‘i he‘ene folofola na‘a ku ‘amanaki pē.
‘Oku hanga hoku laumālie kia ‘Ātonai, ‘O lahi ‘ene holi ‘i he holi ‘a e kau le‘o ki he pongipongi; ‘Io, ‘a e kau le‘o ki he pongipongi.
‘E ‘Isileli, tu‘u ho‘o ‘amanaki ‘ia Sihova; He ‘oku ‘ia Sihova ‘a e ‘ofa. Pea ‘oku ‘i he‘ene ‘Afio ‘a e huhu‘i, ‘o lahi ‘ānoa.
Pea te ne huhu‘i ‘a ‘Isileli ‘e ia Mei he‘enau ngali kovi kotoa.
